segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that wobbly stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to falling, and the floor is already wet from the sink overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he even realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to regret this if their mom catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But right now, they’re too focused on the cookies to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up before the stool gives out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is like watching a slow-motion accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
